And worse, you have this uncomfortable feeling of being scammed by joining them in the first place.Well, you have to stop barking up the wrong tree and start finding the legitimate work-from-home job of your dreams.More importantly, you have to know how to effectively spot the scammers terrorizing unwary opportunity seekers.You need the "Dream Work From Home Job" App. In the Dream Work From Home Job App you'll find:INTRODUCTIONChapter One					WORK-FROM-HOME JOBS VERSUS RUNNING A HOME BUSINESSChapter TwoPINPOINTING PEOPLE WHO SHOULD WORK FROM HOMEChapter ThreeWORK-FROM-HOME PROS and CONSChapter FourTECHNOLOGY AND WORK-FROM-HOME TOOLSChapter FiveWORK FROM HOME JOB SEARCHChapter SixANATOMY OF A WORK-FROM-HOME SCAMChapter SevenWAYS TO DISTINGUISH SCAM FROM REALChapter EightOTHER IMPORTANT ASPECTS OF WORKING FROM HOMECONCLUSION: WORKING FROM HOME AND FULFILLMENT
